mods.abstract: Part 5 of the American Ace Coffee show (usually a Grand Ole Opry segment) from March 20, 1948. Featuring Ralph Christian (announcer), Roy Acuff (host/performer) with his Smoky Mountain Boys, and performers Jimmy Riddle, Pap's Jug Band, Tommy Magness, Bashful Brother Oswald, Joe Zinkan, the Bailes Brothers (Johnnie and Homer), and Sonny Day. Held at the Municipal Auditorium in Shreveport, LA.

recordInfo.recordContentSource: Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum
